thought: The website is accessible, now I need to extract the text from the HTML to analyze the content.
observation: Home | BDC  Skip to main content Main navigation . Contact Us Footer Who We Are About Us Our Brand Our History Organisational Structure Board Of Directors Senior Management Business Sectors Agribusiness BDC Services Industry Property Development And Management Investments Business Plan Guide Investment Process Our Products Sustainability Considerations News And Views Annual Reports Careers Our Newly Promoted Team Members Corporate Social Investment Image Gallery Media Releases News Public Notices Tenders Decisions/Outcomes Investor Relations Events Projects Supplier Registration Bottom Menu Disclaimer FAQs What are you looking for? Search Video file Years Of Building Botswana Fostering Growth and Economic Transformation through Impactful Investments Scroll down Poll What is your main reason for visiting our website? Choices Redirected from another site/search Want to know more about the Corporation Looking for a job/tender Seeking business opportunities We do more than business Find out more Property Services View All Business Upcoming Events 07 - 07 Dec Annual Carols By Candlelight BDC in conjunctio Fairscape Precinct 11 - 14 Oct Global Expo Botswana Gaborone - Fairgrounds View All Events Appointment of Chief Investment Officer - Kudzani Pickup Invitation For Supplier Registration Exercise Issuance And Listing Of Notes View All Notices Latest News Bdc acquires a strategy equity sta… Botswana Development Corporation (“BDC”) is pleased to announce its acquisition of a strategic 3% equity stake in Grit Real Estate Income Group Limited (“Grit”). BDC Launches New Venture BDC hosted a high level delegation from the United Arab Emirates on the 28th of September 2021. Bdc partners with A… Gaborone - Botswana Development Corporation (BDC) and The African Development Bank (AfDB), on the 21st of February 2020, signed a thematic Line of Credit (LoC) of P900 Million for a 10-year tenor. This is the single largest transaction of its nature to ever take place in Botswana demonstrating co… Botswana developme… In a continued bid to contribute to the diversification of the economy and identification of opportune investments BDC has already sponsored many projects. View All Projects Not sure what BDC service is best for you? Contact us now! Email The subscriber's email address. Stay informed, subscribe to our newsletter... Main Menu Trust Us, talk to us anytime Call the tip-offs anonymous free hotline with any information you may have regarding fraud, corruption or other workplace crime. BTC toll free: 0800 600 644 Orange toll free: 144 Mascom toll free: 71119773 Free fax: 0800 00 77 88 bdc@tip-offs.com © Botswana Development Corporation 2024 Developed by Leverage Point

thought: The website http://www.bdc.bw/ is not a scam website. {

observation.reason: The website belongs to the Botswana Development Corporation which is a legitimate organization. The domain information retrieved from WHOIS confirms the legitimacy of the company.
